Security Policy¶

Reporting a Vulnerability¶

Usually, all issues are tracked publicly on GitHub. If you want to make a private report (e.g., for a vulnerability or to attach an example that is not meant to be published), please send an email to mail@nlohmann.me. You can use this key for encryption.
